heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Emergency Measures in the Public
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (Covid-19: employment wage subsidy scheme) 
(Date Adjustment) Order 2021.

title: to fulfil, better, the objectives specified in section 28A(1) of that Act or to
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Emergency Measures in the
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Emergency Measures in the 

Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean emergency measure public interest (covid-19) act 2020 (no 2 2020)

title: to fulfil, better, the objectives specified in section 28A(1) of that Act or to
heading: 3. 31 March 2021 is specified as the day on which the period referred to in
text_raw:
3. 31 March 2021 is specified as the day on which the period referred to in 

section 28B(8)(a)(ii) of the Act of 2020 shall end.
text_norm: 3 31 march 2021 specified day period referred section 28b(8)(a)(ii) act 2020 shall end

title: to fulfil, better, the objectives specified in section 28A(1) of that Act or to
heading: 4. 31 March 2021 is specified as the day on which the period referred to in
text_raw:
4. 31 March 2021 is specified as the day on which the period referred to in 

section 28B(8)(b)(ii) of the Act of 2020 shall end. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 February, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th February, 2021.
